name: Gaelic Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Celt! Discover authentic and evocative Gaelic names perfect for characters, pets, or simply embracing your heritage. Find a name steeped in history and legend. Sláinte!
introduction: Ever dreamed of having a name that echoes through the misty glens and ancient castles of Ireland and Scotland? Our Gaelic Name Generator is your portal to a world of captivating nomenclature. Whether you're writing a fantasy novel, naming your adorable Irish Setter, or just curious about your roots, we've got a treasure trove of authentic Gaelic names waiting to be discovered. Prepare to be enchanted!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and watch the magic happen! We'll conjure up a unique Gaelic name just for you.
Not feeling the first result? No worries! Keep clicking until a name resonates with your soul.
Want to tweak it? Use the prefixes and suffixes to customize the name to your liking. It's like being a Gaelic naming wizard!
Found the perfect name? Copy it and share it with the world! Let everyone know you've embraced your inner Celt.

faqs.question: Are these names actually Gaelic?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We've meticulously curated our database of names from authentic Gaelic sources, ensuring historical accuracy and cultural relevance. We even consulted a leprechaun (just kidding... mostly!).

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Dungeons & Dragons character?
faqs.answer: Of course! In fact, we encourage it! Imagine the epic adventures your Gaelic-named hero will embark on. Just be prepared to explain the pronunciation to your fellow players.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that speaks to you. Think of it as a Gaelic name lottery... but you always win (eventually)!

faqs.question: Is it okay to use these names if I'm not of Gaelic descent?
faqs.answer: While these names are rooted in Gaelic culture, anyone is welcome to appreciate and use them respectfully. Consider it a cultural exchange – just maybe don't claim you're the rightful heir to the Scottish throne.

faqs.question: How often is the name database updated?
faqs.answer: We're constantly adding new names and refining our algorithms to ensure the best possible experience. We're like Gaelic name archaeologists, always digging up new treasures!

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to be added to the generator?
faqs.answer: We love suggestions! If you have a Gaelic name you think would be a great addition, feel free to send it our way. We're always looking to expand our Gaelic name arsenal.
